english.segment1: Lord, I want to know you more;. follow you with all my heart and soul. Lord, I want to know your voice. Lead me in your way, everlasting.
english.segment2: Show me your ways, teach me and guide me in your truth, my savior. Confide in me, speak mysteries, my heart is longing for your touch. For only you can fill this need in me.
english.segment3: Lord, I want to know you more;. follow you with all my heart and soul. Lord, I want to know your voice. Lead me in your way, everlasting.
english.segment4: You go before me, open doors that lead me to your faithfulness. Whisper in me, so heavenly, my heart is longing for your touch. For only you can fill this need in me.
english.segment5: Age to age, everlasting to everlasting. Generations will seek your face.
